meanings.definition: The art of interpreting music through bodily movement.
meanings.sent1: In eurhythmics class, we dance to the music to express our feelings.
meanings.sent2: She studied eurhythmics to learn how to move gracefully to different songs.
meanings.sent3: The eurhythmics performance at the recital was both entertaining and expressive.
meanings.sent4: Her eurhythmics were like a beautiful dance painting, each movement telling a story.
meanings.sent5: The eurhythmics class made learning about music fun and interactive.

meanings.definition: The practice of coordinating bodily movements with musical rhythms.
meanings.sent1: During the eurhythmics session, we matched our steps to the beat of the music.
meanings.sent2: He found eurhythmics helpful in improving his coordination and sense of rhythm.
meanings.sent3: The eurhythmics exercise felt like a dance party with a purpose.
meanings.sent4: Her eurhythmics were so precise, it was as if she was a human metronome.
meanings.sent5: The eurhythmics class taught us how to move in sync with the music.
